Serialized Form

Package orbotix.macro

Class orbotix.macro.MacroCommandCreationException extends java.lang.Exception implements Serializable

Class orbotix.macro.MacroObject extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

Serialized Fields

commands

java.util.ArrayList<E> commands
Commands currently in the macro

lastCommands

java.util.ArrayList<E> lastCommands
The last commands that were sent for replaying

ballMemory

java.util.ArrayList<E> ballMemory
Array that holds the number of bytes between current chunks in memory.

mMacroChunks

java.util.List<E> mMacroChunks
List of "chunks" to be sent to the robot when a macro is sent in chunks

mode

MacroObject.MacroObjectMode mode
The current mode

running

boolean running
Indicates if the macro is currently executing on the ball

registeredObserver

boolean registeredObserver
Indicates if we have registed with the DeviceSession to be an observer for the emit commands to make sure the object doesn't register itself as an observer more than once.

mRunAfterLoading

boolean mRunAfterLoading
Indicates whether a "chunky" macro will run immediately after sending to the ball.

mOnMacroUploadedListener

MacroObject.OnMacroUploadedListener mOnMacroUploadedListener
Runs when a macro is completely uploaded to the robot
